title: game WILL NOT start after champion select
body: I keep on looking and looking there are no things I could do that will resolve these problems. I can't even play league without getting banned cause I don't load after champion select.

replies.body:
Does the loading screen error out on you or does it just never appear at all? 

One good way of getting a better connection if that loading screen isn't loading is to update your DNS and port forward settings. Those two can get you a smoother connection with our servers most of the time, so give it a shot using the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a resource and test it in a custom game.

i got the loading and champ queue errors all today

That's very odd. Maybe I can be of some assistance?

- Have you double checked your firewall to make sure that all processes from League of Legends are allowed (hint: make sure it's up to date)?
- Have you used the Hextech repair tool since this has happened?
- Make sure your internet security settings are set properly. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-#wq2 (<--- Here's how!)

There are some fantastic videos about how to troubleshoot different things on the support page: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues.

Hope I was able to help some! {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
